text: Hello: I installed version 1.5beta 5 of Batik. I get an error when I open an svg file even the simple example that I am including at the end of the message from www.w3.org. I get in addition to the SVG display, an error window opening SVG Error: no protocol java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: and the exception that I am attaching at the end of this report I am using Red hat linux 8.0 and running j2sdk1.4.1_01. I run batik using java -jar batik-squiggle.jar. Thank you for your help Manuel java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: at java.net.URL.(URL.java:579) at java.net.URL.(URL.java:476) at java.net.URL.(URL.java:425) at org.apache.batik.bridge.BridgeContext.initializeDocument(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.GVTBuilder.build(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.swing.svg.GVTTreeBuilder.run(Unknown Source) or java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: at java.net.URL.(URL.java:579) at java.net.URL.(URL.java:476) at java.net.URL.(URL.java:425) at org.apache.batik.bridge.BridgeContext.initializeDocument(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.DocumentLoader.loadDocument(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.URIResolver.getNode(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.URIResolver.getElement(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.BridgeContext.getReferencedElement(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.SVGUseElementBridge.createGraphicsNode (Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.GVTBuilder.buildGraphicsNode(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.GVTBuilder.buildComposite(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.bridge.GVTBuilder.build(Unknown Source) at org.apache.batik.swing.svg.GVTTreeBuilder.run(Unknown Source)
creator: manuelg@bcm.tmc.edu
deweese@apache.org
text:
This works for me.
If I save your example to a file (xxx.svg) and use File->open and select the
file it loads just fine.  Clicking on the ellipse doesn't work because
www.w3.org doesn't provide an SVG version of the site, just HTML (which
we don't render).
